name: Bomb Crossing
description:
In a time of danger and fear, the maids fall into the clutches of a monster. However, the young brothers decided to step forward without hesitation and save these lovely maids. They worked together and formulated a brave and radical plan, deciding to use the power of bombs to destroy the guarding monsters and rescue the maids.

This game is an old and popular puzzle game with simple yet in-depth gameplay. In the game, the player needs to operate a character on the block map and push the bomb to the position of the monster to complete the task. While the rules are simple, clever strategy and thinking are required when solving each level.

The core of the game is moving and pushing bombs. Players can use the mouse to click on the specified coordinates, and the character will automatically run over and push the bomb along the channel of the map. However, this is not an easy task, as the player must take into account the bomb's interaction with walls, obstacles, and other bombs. The movement of each step must be planned reasonably to avoid pushing the bomb to a position where it cannot be moved, resulting in the inability to complete the level.

This game has progressive challenges. As players become familiar with the game mechanism, the difficulty will gradually increase, which prompts players to continuously optimize their strategies and meet new challenges.

In the process of solving puzzles, players develop logical thinking, spatial imagination and problem-solving skills. This game is not only an entertainment, but also an intellectual exercise. Its simple rules and engaging puzzle-solving process make it a beloved classic gaming experience for players of all ages.
